product_title: Inner Cap for Wearing Hijab - Black Hijab Cap Hair Cover

detail.name: Inner Cap for Wearing Hijab - Black Hijab Cap Hair Cover

details.description_text: Product Type: Hijab Cap Country of Origin: Bangladesh Main Material: Synthetic free size This Black Hijab Cap is designed for women who want a comfortable and secure fit under their hijab. Made from high-quality synthetic material, it ensures durability and breathability, perfect for all-day wear. The cap is a free size, fitting most head sizes comfortably. Its soft texture makes it ideal for wearing under hijabs to keep hair in place and provide a smooth foundation for various styles. This inner cap is lightweight, easy to wear, and washable, making it a practical accessory for everyday use. Suitable for Muslim women looking for both comfort and convenience.
